title: Strings
content:
Strings store text. They are immutable (can't change characters in-place).

Common ops:
- Concatenation: +
- Repetition: *
- Slicing: s[start:end]
- Methods: upper(), lower(), split(), join(), strip(), replace()
- f-strings for formatting: f"{var}"
codeExample:
s = "Hello, Python"
print(s.upper())
print(s[0:5])
name = "Alice"
print(f"Hi, {name}!")
